column1: Local Foods////This little place is absolutely delightful. The ingredients here are always so fresh and the breads are scrumptious. The homemade chips are a must with whatever combo you order. The menu must change because they had a Reuben to die for! The Banh Mi is another fave of mine. The soups are AMAZING. This little place does good business
column2: its packed for lunch with difficult to find parking but its a good lunch spot. A little pricey but you will get quality you can see and taste . I think you will have to check it out at least once.
